title: Club still not showing up.
body:
So I created a club called 'United Scrubs' (Tag: Pones) about 6 months ago and added a bunch of my friends. After the clubs went down a month ago I never got added back to my club. Although for my friends, it says I'm still in the club but the tag, club chat and club tab in the alpha client aren't there. 

Could I get put back in my club?

replies.body: I looked into this for you and refreshed it!  Everything looks to be in order now!  Let me know if you still can't see your club.
Anyways you could look into mine as well. I was told to sit tight awhile back and nothings been fixed for me.. I lead a club and can't see it still.
Thank you, I can see the club now, thanks!
Same issue here, my other team mates have their club tag on and see the club chat but I don't have either. (This is for my LAN account)

I am having the same issue, I have 2 clubs, one I was the owner a few months ago but it no longer shows the club yet im still in it? and the other issue is I have another clan tag but its not allowing me to view it in game. Please fix!
